Potresne scene na Gudisonu! Pukla noga Andrea Gomeša, unezvereni Son i molitve Orijea (VIDEO)
Strašno, strašno

03 Nov 2019


Fudbal je ove večeri u Liverpulu pao u drugi plan. Posle onog što se desilo u završnici meča Everton – Totenhem, u derbiju 11. kola Premijer lige, malo će se pričati o igri, šansama (nije ih ni bilo mnogo) ili rezultatu, već o lomu noge Andrea Gomeša.

Portugalac je nastradao u 79. minutu kad ga je potkačio Hjong Min Son, u nastavku akcije na njega je naleteo Serž Orije, a ishod je prelom skočnog zgloba prvotimca domaćeg tima. Koliko je sve bilo strašno svedoči činenica da reditelj prenosa nije dugo želeo da pusti snimak, pošto su scene takve da teraju suze na oči.

















Dok je Andre Gomeš jaukao od bolova na zemlji, fudbaleri oba tima hvatali su se za glavu, jer im je odmah bilo jasno da je reč o teškoj povredi. Najviše se potresao Son, unezvereno je trčao terenom, demonstrirao koliko mu je krivo što je povredio rivala, pa nisu vredele ni reči utehe trenera Maurisija Poketina. Razume se, na kraju je Korejac isključen...



Desni beki Totenhema Serž Orije molio se Bogu za zdravlje Andrea Gomeša, rezervisti oba tima utrčali su na teren, lekarski tim je pružio ekspresnu pomoć vezisti Evertona, međutim, sudeći prema vestima sa lica mesta za njega je sezona gotova.

text:
Earthquake scenes on Goodison! Andre Gomes's Broken Leg, Overture Son and Oriya Prayers (VIDEO)
Terrible, terrible

03 Nov 2019


Football has fallen into disrepute this evening in Liverpool. After what happened in the final of the Everton - Tottenham match in the 11th Premier League derby, there will be little talk about the game, the chances (there weren't many) or the result, but the breaking of Andre Gomes' leg.

The Portuguese was injured in the 79th minute when he was prompted by Hyong Min Son, continued to run into him by Serge Ori, and the result is a fracture of the ankle of the home team champion. How terrible it was to witness the fact that the director of the broadcast did not want to release the film for a long time, as the scenes were such as to bring tears to his eyes.

















While Andre Gomes was crying with pain on the ground, the football players of both teams were clutching their heads as it was immediately clear that this was a serious injury. Son was most shaken, he ran around the field in disbelief, demonstrating how guilty he was of hurting his rival, so the words of coach Maurisi Poketin's consolation were not worth a word. Of course, in the end the Korean is excluded ...



Tottenham right-back Serge Oriya prayed to God for the health of Andre Gomes, reservists of both teams rushed to the field, the medical team provided express assistance to Everton midfielder, however, judging by the news from the scene, the season was over.
